name: Generic function
prompt:
Add a public generic function called Identity to Generic.calr that takes a value of any type and returns it unchanged.

Use this exact Calor generic function syntax:
§F{f001:Identity:pub}<T>
  §I{T:value}
  §O{T}
  §R value
§/F{f001}

The <T> syntax after the function name declares a type parameter:
- T is the type parameter name
- Use T in input and output types
- Caller specifies the actual type
- Multiple type params: <T, U>
